statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir // .cwd"); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); full_dir="${current_dir/#$HOME/~}"; git_info=""; if git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$current_dir" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git_info=" [git:$branch]"; fi; fi; k8s_cluster=$(kubectl config view --minify -o jsonpath="{.clusters[0].name}" 2>/dev/null | sed "s/api-//;s/-intranet-siemens-com:6443//" || echo "no-k8s"); k8s_info=""; if [ "$k8s_cluster" != "no-k8s" ]; then k8s_info=" [k8s:$k8s_cluster]"; fi; printf "\033[1m%s\033[0m:\033[34m%s\033[0m\033[32m%s\033[0m\033[33m%s\033[0m â†’ %s" "$(whoami)" "$full_dir" "$git_info" "$k8s_info" "$model_name"'
